ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_bj-projun | |- ( 1o Proj ( A u. B ) ) = ( ( 1o Proj A ) u. ( 1o Proj B ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_df-bj-pr2 | |- pr2 ( A u. B ) = ( 1o Proj ( A u. B ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-bj-pr2 | |- pr2 A = ( 1o Proj A ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-bj-pr2 | |- pr2 B = ( 1o Proj B ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_uneq12i | |- ( pr2 A u. pr2 B ) = ( ( 1o Proj A ) u. ( 1o Proj B ) ) |
